string.value: Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, has asked you to eliminate the pesky Mavericks and report it to Nalo.

Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, asked you to eliminate some pesky Mavericks. You did so and reported it to Nalo at the top of the tower. Nalo seemed concerned about Hoya's immature and irresponsible actions.

Yoohoo! Here! Over here! How did you get in here? This tower could collapse any minute, you know. Since you've come so far, you're probably here to rumble with the Mavericks. Am I right? Then would you do me a favor?

Nalo says I'm too young and can't take on any major tasks. So he asked me to watch the Mavericks' movement patterns. But I know I can handle bigger things. I have something to investigate, so could you eliminate the Mavericks for me and report it to Nalo upstairs? Just 30 Mavericks of each type. Easy, huh? Then I'll see you later!
Who are you? You want something from me?\r\n#b#L0#I did a favor for Hoya, and I'm here to report it.#l\n#k
Why, that little rascal. I can't believe he dumped his responsibilities on you! I apologize. He doesn't think things through! How could he entrust a stranger with his duties?
Thank you for your help. Hoya will get an earful from me later.
All you have to do is eliminate 30 Maverick Type A, 30 Maverick Type S, and 30 Maverick Type D and report to Nalo.
Please eliminate 30 Maverick Type A, 30 Maverick Type S, and 30 Maverick Type D.
